brief_summary.textblock:
The project will specifically focus on the examination of the influence of substantial
      weight loss due to bariatric surgery on brain functions. Our hypothesis is that substantial
      weight loss after Bariatric Surgery  (BS) or dietary intervention is also accompanied by
      changes in the balance of reward and inhibitory networks. Therefore the investigators will
      conduct a functional magnetic resonance imaging (fMRI) study investigating functional and
      structural measures.

clinical_study.brief_title: Brain Functions in Patients Before and After Bariatric Surgery

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  bariatric surgery in the past or in the future

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  fMRI contraindications

          -  claustrophobia
